title: Tanqueray gin
content: Tough one! According to the Flash file the font used is "Distinctive Tanqueray", so I'm guessing this is custom.. Couldn't find anything else about it. Tanqueray is a [Diageo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221818/http:/www.diageo.com/) Brand, so they probably do all their stuff inhouse. Sorry. ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221818im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)
author: franz
